Content: More than 25 troops of the 11 Division Headquarters in Pallekele under the supervision of Major General Tissa Nanayakkara, General Officer Commanding, 11 Division joined a mega Shramadana campaign, organized at Penideniya National Institute of Education in Peradeniya on Monday (31). At the request of the authorities at this Institute, troops went there and assisted all conducting the self-help programme in order to rid the garbage inside the premises before dawn of the New Year.
